Version History and Future Plans
================================

This section details the version history of MuSS and outlines the roadmap for future improvements.

Version History
---------------

- **v1.0**: Initial release with basic functionality.
- **v1.1**: Added advanced fitting capabilities.

Future Plans
------------

- **v1.2**: Plans to introduce JSON-based output for enhanced data handling and integration.
- Improvements in GUI to reflect real-time changes in input parameters without needing to reload the `.txt` files.
